item.title: Nitrifier abundance and diversity peak at deep redox transition zones
item.description: We provide quantitative constraints on microbial nitrogen cycling in open ocean oligotrophic sediments from seafloor to basement. Local peaks in diversity and abundance at redox transition zones deep within the sediments suggest that nitrogen cycling microbes are revived from their maintenance state and start growing again after millions of years of attrition.
